about_the_game:
Metori is a strategy sandbox game reminiscent of older arcade games. Control many ships, and use tactics to outmaneuver and outnumber everyone else.
Build a fleet. Capture territory. Defeat your enemies.
Note: Metori is not a twin-stick shooter. It is built to be playable with one hand, making it accessible to many gamers.

Features

  • Smart, Tactical Enemy AI!
  • Replayable sandbox gameplay!
  • 1V1 Local multiplayer!

Content

  • Randomly generated maps
  • Many ship types with variants
  • Fight customizable Commanders!
  • Campaign
  • Replayable Instant Action Missions

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1+, Mac OS X 10.9+, Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+.
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support. (So pretty much anything in the last 10 years)
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game size is dependant on platform
